projectPurpose: To scan Cloudflare IP addresses and identify the one with the fastest connection (lowest latency) from the user's location.
mainFeatures: Identify and report the fastest IP node

alternatives.name: CFScanner
mainFeatures: Checks domain filtering on specific IPs
Pings IPs to find the fastest

alternatives.name: Cloudflare Clean IP Scanner (Web Tool)
mainFeatures: Supports using regex for IP filtering

alternatives.name: CloakQuest3r
mainFeatures: Uncovers true origin IP behind Cloudflare

marketPositioning: fast-cloudflare is a specialized, open-source tool focused specifically on identifying the fastest Cloudflare IP address for a user's location. While broader tools like Nmap can perform general network scanning, and others like CFScanner offer additional Cloudflare-specific features like filter checking, fast-cloudflare is positioned as a streamlined, performance-oriented utility dedicated to finding the optimal Cloudflare IP node for improved connection speed and access. Its implementation in Rust suggests a focus on efficiency.
